core
Class MapTile

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  core.MapTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class MapTile
extends javax.swing.JLabel

This represents a tile which is drawn to the MapPanel. It stores information such as the image currently drawn to it (both object and tile layers).

See Also:
Serialized Form

getCollidable

public byte getCollidable()
Simple function to determine if a tile is collidable or not

Returns:
If 1, collidable. If 0, not collidable.
